remarks: Any closed subspace is a member of the range of partial isomorphism A, showing the isomorphism maps onto the set of closed subspaces of partial vector space A. (Contributed by NM, 17-Jan-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
dvadia.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dvadia.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecA ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvadia.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoA ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvadia.n $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocA ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvadia.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` U ) $.
dvadiaN $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( X e. S /\ ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` X ) ) = X ) ) -> X e. ran I ) $.
